mapper.select: select * from category order by idx asc

select g.idx, g.title, g.price, b.content, b.view_count, b.image, u.name from game g, game_type t, board b, user u where g.idx = t.game_idx and b.idx = g.board_idx and u.idx = b.user_idx group by g.title order by g.idx desc

select a.idx , a.title , a.price , a.board_idx , c.name as company_name , d.name as device_name , e.name as type_name , f.name as genre_name from game a inner join game_type b on a.idx = b.game_idx inner join category2 d on b.category2_idx = d.idx inner join category c on d.category_idx = c.idx inner join category3 e on b.category3_idx = e.idx inner join genre f on b.genre_idx = f.idx where 1=1
AND d.idx in (#{device_idx})
AND e.idx in (#{type_idx})
select a.idx , a.title , a.price , a.board_idx , b.view_count , b.image , b.content from game a inner join board b on a.board_idx = b.idx where a.idx = #{idx}
